title.narrative: F.a: Prevention of Child Abuse and Gender based Violence against Women + masculinities

description.narrative: Project aims to increase knowledge and skills of authorities and communities to prevent and to react to gender-based violence and child abuse as well as to enhance national-level cooperation and coordination on the issue. Violence is a common problem in Do minican Republic and according to some studies almost half of the Dominican women aged 30-49 years have been victims of violence at some point of their life. 48 % of the children in the project areas have experienced physical violence and 30 % are victims of violence committed by their teachers. The project offers capacity-building for children, adolescents and adults in order to enhance the capacities in the communities to identify when gender-based violence or child abuse takes place, to prevent them and to react to them. Protection networks are also established and supported in the project areas and the capacities of the authorities in responding to cases of violence are strengthened. As a result of the project, girls, boys and adults in the communities a re better aware of the different forms and risks of violence and they are better equipped to protect themselves from it. Project is implemented by Plan in close co-operation with the Community Development Committees of the 15 project communities.
